name: Ian Zant-Boer
bio: Ian Zant-Boer is a Cambridge-educated lawyer and venture capital founder with extensive experience advising and investing in high-growth businesses. A former “Legal 500 Leading Individual,” he has co-founded a law firm and three VC firms, served as CEO of Growthdeck, and held multiple NED roles. Ian brings a dual legal and investor perspective to scaling and structuring, helping founders prepare for funding rounds, governance, and exit events with clarity and confidence.
